comments: Prior to the contact with the ball, Wood (DET) grabs Ball's (NOP) right arm, affecting his driving shot attempt.
Hart (NOP) commits a take foul on Rose (DET).
Jackson's (NOP) momentum carries him into Wood (DET) and the contact dislodges him from his legally obtained position.
After the pick, Okafor (NOP) slightly extends his hand into Mykhailiuk's (DET) side as he turns and begins his roll towards the rim.
Mykhailiuk (DET) makes "high-five" contact with Jackson (NOP) after the release that does not affect his jump shot attempt.
Rose (DET) maintains a legal guarding position during Jackson's (NOP) shot attempt near the rim.
Okafor (NOP) slightly extends his hand into Wood's (DET) body off ball.
Okafor's (NOP) makes slight forearm extension into Wood's (DET) front during the post play.
Wood (DET) places a hand on the opposite side of Okafor's (NOP) body during his drive to the basket and shot attempt.
Rose (DET) makes marginal contact to Jackson's (NOP) arm that does not affect his ability to gather the rebound.
After communicating with the Replay Center, it was determined that Okafor's (NOP) shot attempt made contact with the rim. NOP maintains possession of the ball and the shot clock is correctly reset.
Okafor (NOP) establishes himself in a legal screening position in Galloway's (DET) path.
Moore (NOP) slightly extends his forearm into Galloway's (DET) front during the drive but his momentum carries him away from the marginal contact.
Wood (DET) is in the paint for less than three seconds when he is imminently actively guarding an opponent.
Although Wood's (DET) stance is slightly wide, he absorbs the contact to the upper body and does not initiate leg to leg contact with Hart (NOP) during the pick.
Okafor (NOP) briefly places a hand on Wood's (DET) front as he defends him in the post.
Moore (NOP) briefly grasps Galloway's (DET) arm but he immediately removes his hand during the rebound.
Jackson (NOP) places a resting hand on Rose's (DET) body during his driving shot attempt.
Okafor (NOP) establishes himself in a legal screening position in Snell's (DET) path and he is firming up over his left leg when the contact occurs during the pick.
Doumbouya (DET) maintains a legal guarding position during Moore's (NOP) shot attempt.
Okafor (NOP) slightly extends his arm into Wood (DET) during the rebound.
After communicating with the Replay Center, the on-court ruling was confirmed. The ball was last touched by Brown (DET) and NOP maintains possession of the ball.
Okafor (NOP) and Wood (DET) come together and mutually engage in marginal contact during the rebound.
Jackson (NOP) makes slight contact to Rose's (DET) arm after the release of the ball during his shot attempt.
Cheatham (NOP) briefly grasps Wood's (DET) shorts during the rebound but he immediately removes his hand.
Wood (DET) briefly places his hand on Cheatham's (DET) shoulder during the rebound but he immediately removes his hand.
